addonManifest.name: Amazon EMR
addonManifest.description: Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) is a web service that makes it easy to quickly and cost-effectively process vast amounts of data.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: Updated to reflect changes in Amazon SDK, configured to work on .NET 4.5 runtime, and updated for work in Apprenda 5.0.
addonManifest.author: Chris Dutra

property.description: If set to true, each developer will need to provide their own Amazon credentials, otherwise the default creds will be used to provision Redshift instances.
